description: A cool and solitary high school sophomore. She is in charge of the band`s bass. Nijika`s best friend. Her hobbies and other things are out of this world, and she is pleased when people call her an oddball. Although she lives in a wealthy family, she spends a lot of money on musical instruments and is always short of money. She occasionally eats weeds to keep herself from being hungry.
name: Yamada Ryou
